snippet: The chief executive officer of a Boston-based news organization says James Foley's kidnappers last week threatened to kill him in response to U.S. bombings in Iraq....

headline.print_headline: CEO: Kidnappers Threatened Foley's Life Last Week
headline.main: CEO: Kidnappers Threatened Foley's Life Last Week

lead_paragraph: The chief executive officer of a Boston-based news organization says James Foley's kidnappers last week threatened to kill him in response to U.S. bombings in Iraq.
